examples.example: 这位会计工作认真负责，把公司的账目处理得井井有条。

translate.english: This accountant works carefully and responsibly, and handles the company's accounts in an orderly manner.

examples.example: 我的梦想是成为一名优秀的会计，为企业的发展贡献自己的力量。

translate.english: My dream is to become an excellent accountant and contribute my own strength to the development of the enterprise.

examples.example: 这位会计很专业，用他精湛的技能为公司的财务工作保驾护航。

translate.english: This accountant is very professional, using his excellent skills to escort the financial work of the company.
